bibl.title: The Archive of Salome Komaise Daughter of Levi: Another Archive from the 'Cave of Letters'.
bibl.note: The archive, consisting of six documents, originated in Nahal Hever. Like the Babatha archive, it too belonged to a Jewish woman from Mahoza. - Family tree of Salome Komaïse daughter of Levi. - The Names. - I. P. Jerus. Rockefeller Mus. Box 866 = XHev/Se Gr. 5 [ed.: Hannah M. COTTON, Rent or Tax Receipt from Maoza, ZPE 100 (1994) pp. 547-557 et pl. XXXII c]. Receipt for tax on dates. Mahoza, 29 January 125 CE. - II. P. Jerus. Mus. of Israel Inv. 3001 a-c + P. Jerus. Rockefeller Mus. Box 866 = XHev/Se Gr. 5 [ed.: Hannah M. COTTON, Another Fragment of the Declaration of Landed Property from the Province of Arabia, ZPE 99 (1993) pp. 115-121 et pl. XIII d]. Conclusion to a Land Declaration. Arabia, 25 April 127. - III. P. Jerus. Rockefeller Mus. Box 866 = XHev/Se Gr. 5 [unpublished]. A Deed of Renunciation of Claims. Mahoza, 127 (?) CE. - IV. P. Jerus. Rockefeller Mus. Box 869 = XHev/Se Gr. 1 [unpublished]. Deed of Gift. Mahoza, 9 (?) November 129 CE. - [V. Receipt for Dates in Aramaic.] - VI. P. Yadin I, 37. Marriage contract. Mahoza, 7 August 131 CE. - Appendix: List of documentary marriage contracts between Jews from the Judaean Desert.
